dt-event.name: key-blur
dt-event.summary: KeyTable has blurred focus from a cell

type.parameter: DataTable API instance for the table in question
A DataTables API instance that contains the cell that was blurred (`dt-api cell()`)

dt-event.description:
While it is often useful to know when a cell gains focus (`kt-event key-focus`) it is equally useful to know when cells loose focus. This event provides that ability and is triggered whenever a cell's focus is blurred. This can be the result of:
* Focus moving to a different cell * Focus leaving the table (`kt-init keys.blurable`).
This event will occur prior to the `kt-event key-focus` event (if there is a cell to be blurred - i.e. two cells can never have focus at the same time). Additionally, if a DataTables page change is required to display a newly focused cell, this event will occur before the page change is triggered.

example.title: Show information about a cell when focus is changed
